name: Toxins
content:
Toxins

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.leRgt3wnroE6KgFV]{Deadly Poison I} 1 Toxin, Consumable Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+3/Resistance) 20

This item only has an effect if the target is a [Mob] enemy. The target becomes [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice).
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.wT5CKnxGzyPWLtAQ]{Curse Poison I} 1 Toxin, Consumable, Blight Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+3/Resistance) 20

Deal [2D + 2] magical damage to the target. This damage always has the [Blight] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.TY8sGwWH2BQRz15Z]{Holy Water I} 1 Toxin, Consumable, Holy Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+4/Resistance) 20

Deal [1D] penetrating damage to the target. This damage always has the [Holy] tag, even if another effect would overwrite it.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.NguI7JRXYH1CJBCD]{Trance Poison I} 1 Toxin, Consumable Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+3/Resistance) 20

The target takes [Dazed].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.HBlItkt4ekjVVc9o]{Sealing Poison I} 1 Toxin, Consumable, Rare Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+2/Resistance) 20

The target is unable to inflict Bad Statuses with its actions. Treat this effect as a Bad Status that is removed at the end of the target's next Main Process.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.toxins.3yfaydcHKMYz6IFO]{Decay Poison I} 2 Toxin, Consumable Major Single Close Opposed (2d6+4/Resistance) 30
